remarks: Lemma for ~ mdsymi .  This is the forward direction of Lemma 4(i) of [Maeda] p. 168.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdsymlem1.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
mdsymlem1.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
mdsymlem1.3 $e |- C = ( A vH p ) $.
mdsymlem4 $p |- ( p e. HAtoms -> ( ( B MH* A /\ ( ( A =/= 0H /\ B =/= 0H ) /\ p C_ ( A vH B ) ) ) -> E. q e. HAtoms E. r e. HAtoms ( p C_ ( q vH r ) /\ ( q C_ A /\ r C_ B ) ) ) ) $.
$d A p q r $.
$d B p q r $.
$d C q r $.
